website_summaries.verdict: Fun and easy to use. Designed so you won’t make a mess or waste any time producing fluffy omelets.
pros: Cooking time is generally less than 15 minutes
Indicator lights alert when food is done, so there’s no guessing
Easy to store, and comes with a helpful manual to get started
Looks small but produces fluffy, filling omelets with little effort
cons: Don’t forget to spray the cooking surface with a little bit of cooking oil before using to avoid burning

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in product.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to order this omelette maker, however reading the description it says "non stick"... It it far from non stick. You can't really put much veggies in it if you want 2 eggs or it will overflow. Literally 1-1.5 spinach leaf, 1 SMALL slice tomato, and 3 small cube ham and 2 eggs... It overflowed EVERYWHERE... And it stuck bad. It doesn't fully cook through the whole omelette, if you leave it in there alittle longer it burns the egg. I'm very disappointed in this product and wish I wouldnt have spent the money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Megan V

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: If you like omelettes and don't have one of these, I feel soooo sorry for you! This is really good product. Nice looking, heats up fast, so easy to clean. I used two eggs, 2 tablespoons of milk, salt and pepper, onions and green pepper, mixed well and poured 1/2 in one side and 1/2 in the other, closed the lid and 8 minutes later, perfect omelettes! No complaints what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: SEAL2

customer_reviews.title: Yes and No
customer_reviews.text: Yes: Quick and easy. No: Do not follow the instructions for cooking time! The instructions said 3 minutes so my first attempt using their guide got me a shriveled burnt dry nasty mess. After playing around with it I found that using 3 eggs, a little chicken broth, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, and cubed ham; maximum cook time is 1 1/2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Small omelets. Over flowed easily as omelets cooked and the clean-up from that was a nightmare.. Non-stick finish wasn't as nice as what's on other appliances we own. For the price it was ok but I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jccdac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Keto lifestyle on the go
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our lifestyle. We make a few omelettes at the beginning of the week and take them on the go in the mornings. We eat Keto so easy, on the go, breakfasts aren’t easy to come by. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 30 minutes and already made an omelette. Very easy to use and after 10 minutes I had a perfect, fluffy omelette. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Makes great omelets
customer_reviews.text: Makes great omelets, but cleaning is harder than we thought it would be. We have a Panani maker and a waffle maker that are both easy to clean. The non stick coating on this omelet maker seems to be rough and not smooth, catching food much easier than the other units with the non stick coating.. Thats the only draw back. Did give one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mrfixit

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my mom, we had one before and my dad took it in the divorce (yeah it was that petty). She looked everywhere for another one and I tried here! I didn't remember exactly what we used to have but I checked with my brother and he said it looked pretty similar. And it is! I love it, makes omelets so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: TryingThatFitLife

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but it kinda smells funny when you cook with it. I've tried it a few times and there is this artificial aroma in the air. The finished product itself tastes fine. Update: Downgrade from 3 stars to 2. It's really not a very useful appliance. I've had it for 2 months and I'm definitely regretting the purchase. My guess is that I'll be throwing this in the Goodwill box next time we do spring cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan - WA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Omelet every time !!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! This is a godsend, was able to use it right away no issues, gets hot extremely fast so please make sure you’re ready to pour your omelets before you plug it in. Doesn’t have a timer but you can smell when it’s done. I would say 5-7 maybe 8 minutes not the recommended 10 or more. So again I would listen and once you start to smell the ingredients it’s about time to open and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Williams

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate product information
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this omelette maker because the product info said there were measurement markings inside the cavities. There are no markings. I called Holstein, the manufacturer, and was advised they discontinued the markings because they were confusing. The rep was very polite and knowledgeable. I am happy with the maker but suggest you don't purchase if the markings are important. They said they would request Amazon to edit the measurement info.
customer_reviews.author: mollie bean

customer_reviews.title: THIN NONSTICK
customer_reviews.text: Nonstick black material come off NO MATTER how much cooking spray or oil you use. Works SO well, BUT I dont want eat that nonstick material. I had 2 and both had that problem. It's not even like I'm scraping it either. Eggs don't stick AT ALL and still that stuff came off on them
customer_reviews.author: kristine Falanga

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great omelet maker. Works well, making two omelets at a time. I wish the light would indicate the omelet was ready.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Heads up Amazon customers!!!! Don't pass this up....
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this omelette cooker. We'll never have to go out to a restaurant to get a perfectly cooked omelette again. Really can't express how good this little appliance performs....
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McCall

customer_reviews.title: Handy omelette maker!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this last week because I wanted to have something like this in the office so I could make eggs and try cooking other food (bacon, etc.). I tried it at home and found it cooked well. I've made omelettes, bacon and just eggs. I noticed that you can use 4 eggs to fill us the 2 sides. I only use 2 eggs and it did not completely fill us the compartments - so you have to open it and make sure it does not overcook. And I was pleasantly surprised that it did not add a metallic/taflon flavor.
customer_reviews.author: JuniperSky

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fluffy omelettes in 12 minutes-It does get hot on the outside so be sure to use oven mits when opening after cooking- I forgot to use cooking spray the first time I used it and my cheese and mushrooms omelette did not stick one bit just slid right out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Runny or Burnt?
customer_reviews.text: We have tried to use this device several times. The omelets are either runny or burnt. We've used the recommended time in the instructions and several others, but we can't get a good omelet out of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this ... i tried using it twice and it overlooked the omelette each time ...it was easy to clean and seemed simple enough but was disappointed in it
customer_reviews.author: Rockford Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First off box was horrible when received. Like if it was returned then resold. It worked the first couple of times but then stopped working. I suggest spending a little more money and buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: It's as keeper. A staple on my countertop
customer_reviews.text: Nice non-stick, easy yo clean omelet pan. Heats quickly & evenly. D.c. oesn't take up very much dpace, pretty & useful for warming items, also.
customer_reviews.author: TR Strawberrie

customer_reviews.title: Great little maker!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a work breakfast. I made about 20 omelets. I did notice that you dont really need to spray the top everything with cooking spray. The omelets dont reall touch it. I used a 2 ounce ladle for the eggs,put in fresh vegetables and then topped it off with a little more egg.
customer_reviews.author: shawna l edwards

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy, but small.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is quick and easy. I still prefer doing omelets in my stove top omelet pan.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Noeldner

customer_reviews.title: Use 2 eggs
customer_reviews.text: Be careful it gets hot and makes amazing omlets. Also directions say two weeks to a side and fallow that. I tried one cauze a bit ran out. Just put down a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Hellie May

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Tried vegetable and ham omelets. Only negative is you have to keep your eye on it. It has no auto-of switch and it's so quick, you can easily overcook the omelet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but don't go by how long it takes to cook a omelet, half the time it says in the instructions
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for son and daughter in law, they are into big breakfasts before work in the am, this looked easy and convenient and less pans/mess for them to clean up. Told them, if they didn't want it, I would
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Unit gets too hot on outside
customer_reviews.text: It does not have an N on or off switch. When you plug in the outside gets very hot. Do not like this it can damage countertops
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: INGENIUS WAY TO STUFF AN OMELET
customer_reviews.text: Wow! this little machine can cook up some omelets in a hurry! I bought 2. We made custom omelets for 80 people in no time. So easy
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dramberger

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and it does exactly what it promises. Easy to clean, too. One thing to remember is that this sucker gets HOT. The instructions say that eggs will cook in 10-12 minutes, which is WAY too long to leave anything in here. I’d say 4 minutes, 5 tops. It’d be nice if there was a way to control the heat level. Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality and always sticking at the bottom of pot
customer_reviews.text: I feel disappointed at this product. It is not a non-sticky pot. I use it to make my breakfast: pancake or egg. There always are remains at the bottom of pot and hard to clean. To avoid sticking , I add oil before pouring the egg and raw cake stuff. yet it is not helpful to prevent the sticking.
customer_reviews.author: sofame543

customer_reviews.title: Quality, perfect portions, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: It makes a perfect omelette, and it’s easy to clean. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It's an egg scrambler not a omelette machine
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it at first but it stopped making omelettes and made scrampled eggs after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy omlette lover with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disgusting when we opened the package to see eggs stuck to our new omlette maker. Seriously. How nasty. Never had anything like that happen. I never write reviews but come on. Seriously
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: It was good for the first few uses (maybe 7 times), then the omelet started to stick, even if oil was applied.Sort of small, fits 1 egg plus some veggies and cheese to each cavity.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen

customer_reviews.title: It was great until it stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in october, it's great but stopped working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: joffrey daras

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Added cheese on top that burned on lid that I can’t get off. It had an odor when first received. While heating up and also while omelet was cooking the machine a snapping sound The bottom was actually easy to clean. I definitely wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Veed

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. Very glad I purchased it. I highly recommend this omelette maker and this brand of appliances.
customer_reviews.author: IrateGerbil

customer_reviews.title: I Should Get A Commission!
customer_reviews.text: I used this at a recent brunch get together. After the brunch 3 omelet makers were purchased. This shows how much everyone loved the omelet maker!
customer_reviews.author: sinlis

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend as the first time or two we used it nothing stuck. Once used for the third time and other times after that everything stuck. I tried pam and butter bur still stuck. Also, the front screw in the bottom pan came out and will not hold the front in the bottom in place. Not much money but would not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burnt
customer_reviews.text: Product began to smell like burnt plastics and when I finished my omelet that grease stain didn’t come out when I cleaned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift to my brother and his wife. I hope they enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kimlinger

customer_reviews.title: Would buy as
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, easy to make. Omelettes ready in under 3 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia

customer_reviews.title: Wipe down before use
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Just make sure you wipe it down with a damp paper towel before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Radebe

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product, overall
customer_reviews.text: It might have been the way I cooked the omelette, but it seemed like something you'd get at a fast food restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy omelette in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This so much easier then the fry pan. Took a couple of try’s to get the way we love omelets them. Cooking time controls moisture and done.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It burnt the outside of the eggs and didn't cook the insides.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Much appreciated for shipping this without a box. Now my dad knew exactly what I got him for Father’s Day. If I could rate it zero stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: WOW...Great Omelettes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gag gift for GF for Valentines day. Anyway, we decided to use it one weekend morning. We cooked the omelette for 9 minutes and they came out EXCELLENT. We were both very surprised at how the meal looked and tasted. Great item to buy.
customer_reviews.author: PLE

customer_reviews.title: It is not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: The eggs stick very easily, the material is not antihaderent.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Paola Garcia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It does take about 10 minutes to cook but is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it everyday for breakfast I also use it to make biscuits. Easy cleaning and eggs does not burn easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a 2 person family.
customer_reviews.text: As described it does over cook if your not careful so check it constantly and wait to put cheese on until it's done cooking or you'll have to really scrub it. I use it several times a month.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I use if all the time for a quick breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: wanda kacal

customer_reviews.title: Booklet instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product,but instruction booklet needd to be replaced. Can one be sent to me?
customer_reviews.author: Wilda A.

customer_reviews.title: Ggggghhhh
customer_reviews.text: It cook so fast burn the eggs it doesn’t cook the inside and Not easy to clean are used to only once I recommend other brands are use a different brand and I love it but this brand is very very bad
customer_reviews.author: raed alatiyat

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I used it to make pancakes and they turned out ok. I bought an omlet maker years ago and loved it but i dont remember the cooker i had before being this wobbly. I am fan of these types of cookers but wouldn't recommend this brand to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun, safe way for everyone in our family to make their own custom omlet.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Quick & easy omelettes
customer_reviews.text: It took a few tries but I finally figured out when the omelettes were done. I wish I could take it apart and pop the one piece in the dishwasher, but that wouldn't stop me from buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: BDB

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy omelettes
customer_reviews.text: This.makes the perfect omelettes. So easy to use comes out perfect everytime
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for,easy to clean and makes the perfect omelette.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Omlet
customer_reviews.text: The omelets came out very nice. I like my omelets to be a little crispy on the edges and this little maker fills the bill. Very compact, sits in the cupboard nicely.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put too many meats/veggies in with the egg. It won’t fit and takes longer to cook.
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use. Brought it to work to make breakfast for my department.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Matz

customer_reviews.title: small but effective
customer_reviews.text: works great...makes a perfect 2 egg omelette in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Fred Polo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect omelet maker!
customer_reviews.text: I find nothing to dislike about this omelet maker. It is very functional and makes perfect omelets every time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I could have bought at Walmart. easier to return
customer_reviews.text: had to do about 3 different test run to make a decent omelet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but died!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but died after two months! Was probably used 10 times only. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Makes good omelette but the amount you have to leave it in makes the omelette have a light brown on outside
customer_reviews.author: Tony Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Makes yummy omlets.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product.Love omlets,and can now make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.Danzer

customer_reviews.title: Only thing to do is jyst wipe it out and it's clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest to use and clean appliance I have!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Railey

customer_reviews.title: Works but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept but the 2 sides should be deeper to accommodate the eggs and fillings.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR NZ. ONLY USA POWER
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for nz power. Only used once will not heat up. Only red and green lights on but no heat!!
customer_reviews.author: helenlen

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and it wouldn’t turn on. No green or red light on. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Omelette
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Very simple to use. Omelette is very light and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Smith

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY....DOESN'T WORK...
customer_reviews.text: UNIT BURNS THE EGGS NO MATER HOW YOU USE IT. i BLEW THROUGH A DOZEN EGGS TRYING TO GET IT RIGHT. FINALLY GAVE UP AND TOSSED IT IN THE GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this item is GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use!!! Also the price! Wonderful item☺️ GREAT 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , co UK led be bigger but this is a test run to see if I like the concept. Works well
customer_reviews.author: James Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, only problem is the smell, it’s very pungent and doesn’t go away quickly when cooking eggs
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! We are getting a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: Open and put right back in box. So didn't use. Extremely to small for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I wasted a dozen eggs trying to make a decent omelette with this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Gailzie

customer_reviews.title: When Is It Ready To Use
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to tell when the omlett was ready to put the egg batter in.
customer_reviews.author: CalAnne

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: 6 minutes for 3 eggs makes a great omelette everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Omelettes
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work sees and smells my omelettes and wants one. They are quick and delish!
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this wish I would of found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t make good omits they turn out very dry. Tried 4 omelets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the lazy
customer_reviews.text: and I am the lazy! I hate cooking, and I want something I can make relatively fast, look no further this thing is perrrrrfect! scamble the eggs, dump em on in, get ready in the morning come back and eggs are done. perfect omelette, this is the 1st time i actually went through a dozen eggs with out wasting them because of lazy ness
customer_reviews.author: kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Great to use in office break room.
customer_reviews.text: Great omelet maker. Two minutes and I’ve got a nice hot & fluffy omelet. I pre chop my ingredients at home for the week to save time. No more smelly, rubbery eggs from reheating in the office microwave again. Made great pancakes too with just add water pancake mix. I apply Pam cooking spray once it’s hot and clean it right away after I’m finished. Clean up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: burnt eggs!
customer_reviews.text: no matter what i did the eggs are always brown and nasty on the outside! its all any of us can taste. sending it back for refund. insane the instructions say to cook them for 10-12 minutes too!! in as little as 3 minutes theyre brown and burnt on the outside! good luck to the rest of you.
customer_reviews.author: Maupassant

customer_reviews.title: Omelet maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this omelet maker in Sept. 2018, and went to go use yesterday Nov. 3, 2018, and it wont come on. It only lasted 2 months. I paid $25.00 for this maker. I am very disappointed the warranty is only 30 days. What a rip off!!! Don't buy its not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Says to cook for 12 minutes, but that's far too long. We do 3.5 minutes then unplug it and let it continue to cook another 3.5. Machine only has one heat setting and it's too hot. But we learned how to use it best and they turn out great. It makes about 1.5 each omlet on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Not much going on here. add your egg and cook. Biggest complain is the omelet's area small. Does a good job making your tiny omelet's though.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Potesta

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool
customer_reviews.text: So I used this for an appreciation breakfast at work and it worked wonders. Hard to tell when the omelette is done as the lights just indicates the temperature. You can only use about 2 eggs on each side and a pinch of ingredients. Other than that I like it. Teal color as described
customer_reviews.author: Tishaw16

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who loves cooking and loves egg. Most of all he loves cooking eggs. He hated this thing. The eggs will stick and not cook properly. Its easier to just use a plain ol pan to cook your omelets.
customer_reviews.author: Tsalagi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted! Almost.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little omelet maker. It's compact, easy to use and easy to clean. Perfect for two people. The only complaint I have is that I wanted a red one and they're always out of stock. :) Got my Mom the teal color and she loves hers, too.
customer_reviews.author: G.L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: You will be disappointed do yourself a favor forget about it.
customer_reviews.text: This is just a piece of junk didn’t even bother to return it I just threw it out. Does not have even heat the very reason I ordered this was to cook the omelet on both sides. The bottom burns and the top is uncooked.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Matuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter, she was having problems with making omelets , she loves it it is easy for her. And her man loves he’s omelets now, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Darling

customer_reviews.title: If you love eggs this is a great way to cook them
customer_reviews.text: I used this for making an omelet and it worked out just perfectly. Hot and yummy! Quick and easy to use and very easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D Iburg

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Omlet maker because it seals in your ingredients and taste way better than then using the microwave. It came earlier than I expected. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious outlook

customer_reviews.title: Great little omelette cooker fast.
customer_reviews.text: For someone who doesn’t really know how to cook it’s a life saver. Just don’t eat too many eggs it’s bad for you!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jeon

customer_reviews.title: Omelette maker
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. My only drawback so far is that the plates aren't removable to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: scforbes

product_meta.title: Holstein Housewares HH-09125007E Omelet Maker, Teal
product_meta.description: Color:TealMaking the most out of the most important meal of the day, the Holstein Omelet Maker makes two fluffy omelets in just a few minutes. By simply pouring in your mixture and closing the lid you will have delicious omelets ready to enjoy. The Omelet Maker has a stainless steel top, and a non-stick coating for easy clean up. Its non-slip base makes for safe cooking and its indicator light lets you know when it is ready to start cooking. Holstein's Omelet Maker simplifies life in the kitchen and makes everyday cooking and entertaining easy!
feature_bullets: With the Omelet Maker, using your fry pan is a thing of the past
Easily make delicious and fluffy omelets without flipping
Cooking and cleaning is easy with non-stick coated cooking surfaces
